title: Bug 113047: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, no children node listing is displayed. After closing and reopening the data set editor, the issue persists.
SR: To reproduce the bug: 1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement. 2. In the data set editor, navigate to the data source page. 3. Change the data source to one that has no database, table, or column information. 4. Observe that no children node listing is displayed. 5. Close and reopen the data set editor to confirm the issue remains.
